currentPost.title: March Event: How to Retain New Patients in Your Practice
currentPost.excerpt: For most patients, location, services, price, insurance coverage and reviews are some of the main factors that decide where they [ More.. ]
currentPost.content:
For most patients, location, services, price, insurance coverage and reviews are some of the main factors that decide where they receive dental care. While it is great when a practice brings in new patients, it is even better when the new patient decides to continue visiting the practice for health needs. Dentists can retain patients and build lasting patient relationships through specific techniques in the digital market. Fortunately, Burkhart Dental is hosting an event with speakers from our team at Doctor Genius and Nickerson Consulting.

What you need to know

Titled, “Are You Retaining New Patients in Your Practice?” This event takes place on Friday, March 17, 2017, at the Marriot Residence Inn 38305 Cook Street, Palm Desert, CA 92211. The event will be from 9 a.m. to 12 p.m. and will open registration at 8:30 a.m. for attendees. The conference will begin with a continental breakfast before our speakers take the stage to present. The speakers will answer questions that many medical professionals in the field ask and struggle with on a regular basis. These questions include:
  • How do you determine a true active patient base?
  • How do you determine new patients in your practice?
  • How do you look at retention with new patients?
  • How do you determine growth from these key indicators?
Retaining patients can be difficult for a practice of any medical background. While there are a variety of possible techniques for retaining patients and building a consistent amount of patients, not all techniques will be the most effective. This event will help to offer insight into which techniques are more effective in helping with patient retention.

Guest speakers

“Are You Retaining New Patients in Your Practice?” This event takes place on Friday, March 17, 2017, at the Marriot Residence Inn 38305 Cook Street, Palm Desert, CA 92211.
There are three main speakers at the event, two of which are speakers from the Doctor Genius team. Our Vice President of Support and CS, Andres Gutierrez and our Senior Marketing Strategist of the Sales and Marketing Department, John Rallis will speak on the marketing engine that drives profits. The two of them will also go over building trustworthy connections with patients that lead to sustainable practice growth. They will also highlight how Doctor Genius helps to implement these techniques. The third speaker is Sheri Nickerson of Nickerson Consulting. Nickerson has experience as a treatment coordinator, insurance biller, scheduling coordinator and office manager. Her experiences and skill have led to her helping over 2,000 clients around the country reach their goals and achieve success. Nickerson brings experience, insight and passion for the field of dentistry to this event to speak on effective patient retention. If you are interested in joining this event or have any other questions, please RSVP to Naomi Russo at nrusso@burkhartdental.com or call 858-694-5504. Sign up for a chance to explore techniques for retaining patients with like-minded individuals today.

Doctor Genius

At Doctor Genius, we work with clients to expand their private practice by helping them reach, engage and convert consumers into new patients. By offering high-end web marketing services to medical and health professionals throughout the United States, we help clients gain more profit and build trustworthy relationships with patients to initiate sustainable practice growth. We construct a website for your practice, establish an active online presence, build and constantly update social media profiles, help you build stronger connections with patients, streamline the appointment scheduling process, funnel traffic from search engines directly to your practice website and much more. To begin the process of increasing the success and presence of your practice, give us a call at 877-477-2311.

prevPost.title: Business of Dentistry: How to Start Your Own Practice
prevPost.excerpt: Starting your own practice can seem simple enough. Get the degree, practice dentistry for a few years, rent the building, [ More.. ]
prevPost.content:
Starting your own practice can seem simple enough. Get the degree, practice dentistry for a few years, rent the building, purchase the equipment and set up a practice. It sounds easy, right? Unfortunately, setting up a private practice is full of speed bumps and difficulty. A degree and professional experience will not be enough to set up your own private practice. Fortunately, we are teaming up with Burkhart Dental Supply Company and a plethora of guest speakers at an event to provide patients with the advice and knowledge of experts in the field.

Not as easy as 1, 2, 3…

While there is no single proven method for starting a new practice or magic trick that makes everything come together perfectly, this event can offer the next best thing. We can offer event attendees insight from professionals of various fields that have experience of building a private practice. Individuals interested in acquiring an existing practice or building a new practice will greatly benefit from this event. The event takes place on Friday, April 28, 2017, from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., in San Diego, CA. People interested in attending this event can register on our website. Speakers at the event will cover topics including:
  • How to conduct a search for a practice
  • How to secure a loan and complete your due diligence on a practice
  • How to set up the structure of your practice to include front and back office
  • How to market your practice to attract new patients
  • How to plan with the end in mind
To create a practice a professional needs a set plan in place. Our speakers will bring insight and expertise from various fields of businesses to help professionals understand more about effectively starting and maintaining a practice.

Top industry speakers

The speakers at this event bring expertise from backgrounds of Real Estate, Law, Consulting, Marketing and Accounting. Along with our own Philllip Lopez, VP of Sales and Andres Gutierrez, VP of Client Services, we have 11 guest speakers at the event. Speakers from Bank of America; Burkhart Dental Supply; HR for Health; PracticeCFO; Jones Lang LaSalle; Mostofi Law Group, Inc.; and Nickerson Consulting will offer advice to attendees on a variety of topics. The speakers will use their expertise to cover various requirements that professionals need in order to successfully launch a private practice. Our speakers will cover how professionals can truly thrive in the field of dentistry with knowledge of today’s market. The conference will also help attendees understand the importance of setting up a plan with goals for the practice. Event attendees will learn the importance of considering all factors in the early planning stages. To learn more about the event or to register for it, click here. Space is limited, register online today!

nextPost.title: More than Just Magic: SEO Services at Doctor Genius
nextPost.excerpt: With the vast potential for reaching patients in the digital marketing landscape, private practices need to know the best methods [ More.. ]
nextPost.content:
With the vast potential for reaching patients in the digital marketing landscape, private practices need to know the best methods for utilizing this market. When people hear a company or service mention Search Engine Optimization, SEO, many automatically assume that it is black magic or a hat full of cheap parlor tricks. At Doctor Genius, we have no ulterior motives or cheap tricks hidden up our sleeves. With the proper SEO services backing up a practice, the owner of the practice will experience an increase of influence and reach in the digital landscape.

The need to know about SEO

One main tip that can help clients understand SEO is that there is no shortcut to success. Any SEO service that states a website only needs more keywords to reach a larger audience or to purchase more links is not truly going to help the company’s website. Google recently posted a video on the subject of hiring an SEO company, presented by Developer Programs Tech Lead, Maile Ohye. Ohye covers several key factors that people need to search for when considering investing in SEO services. The truth is that an SEO company can only do so much with any given website.  “An SEO’s potential is only as high as the quality of your business or website,” Ohye states. Ohye also highlights the fact that an SEO company “Looks to improve the entire searcher experience” from “search results to clicking on your website and potentially converting.” A few services that can help clients achieve this through the use of SEO services include:
  • A mobile-friendly website
  • Good navigation
  • Tools to build a great brand
It takes time for an SEO company, such as Doctor Genius, to develop or enhance a website and lead to a positive increase in the client’s practice. In fact, as Ohye states, SEO companies need “four months to a year to help your business first implement improvements and then see potential benefits.” Another key component for any company to consider when investing in SEO is that the entire company needs to be committed to the SEO improvements.
“An SEO’s potential is only as high as the quality of your business or website,” –Maile Ohye

Put in the effort to watch a company grow

With a multitude of methods for improving a company’s online presence through SEO, there are also factors to get the best use out of SEO. Other tips for possible clients who are wary of investing in SEO services that Ohye states include:
  • Conducting a two-way interview between the SEO company and the client
  • Being prepared to answer some questions about one’s business that the SEO company may ask
  • Being prepared to receive feedback from an audit on the company and the rates for improving specific areas
At Doctor Genius, we build clients a new website and cover many more aspects than simply placing keywords in the right places. As Ohye states in her video, one of our main goals is to help clients identify their target patient demographic and track how those patients search specific terms online. We use honest methods to help our clients rank online with quality content. For more information on our services or to sign up, call us at 877-477-2311.
